Hello, Team !
Can Any one help me how to get specific ticket related all properties with api?

```Hello community, I would like to know if you can help me, I have to extract all the associations between two custom objects, the documentation is only the following endpoint /crm/v4/objects/{objectType}/{objectId}/associations/{toObjectType}, but It is one by one and I need to consult everyone, I appreciate your collaboration```

Hello Everyone, I need help to pull HubSpot custom report data using report IDs.

Since, they isn't any native way to pull it. Are you aware of any workaround which can do this for me ?
